verses.t: Now when{G1161} Jesus{G2424} was born{G1080} in{G1722} Bethlehem{G965} of Judaea{G3588} in{G1722} the days{G2250} of Herod{G2264} the king{G3588}, behold{G2400}, there came{G3854} wise men{G3097} from{G575} the east{G395} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414},

Saying{G3004}, Where{G4226} is{G2076} he{G3588} that is born{G5088} King{G935} of the Jews{G2453}? for{G1063} we have seen{G1492} his{G846} star{G3588} in{G1722} the east{G3588}, and{G2532} are come{G2064} to worship{G4352} him{G846}.
When{G1161} Herod{G2264} the king{G3588} had heard{G191} these things, he was troubled{G5015}, and{G2532} all{G3956} Jerusalem{G2414} with{G3326} him{G846}.

And when{G2532} he had gathered{G4863} all{G3956} the chief priests{G3588} and{G2532} scribes{G1122} of the people{G3588} together{G4863}, he demanded{G4441} of{G3844} them{G846} where{G4226} Christ{G3588} should be born{G1080}.
And{G1161} they said{G2036} unto him{G846}, In{G1722} Bethlehem{G965} of Judaea{G3588}: for{G1063} thus{G3779} it is written{G1125} by{G1223} the prophet{G3588},

And{G2532} thou{G4771} Bethlehem{G965}, in the land{G1093} of Juda{G2448}, art{G1488} not{G3760} the least{G1646} among{G1722} the princes{G3588} of Juda{G2448}: for{G1063} out of{G1537} thee{G4675} shall come{G1831} a Governor{G2233}, that{G3748} shall rule{G4165} my{G3450} people{G3588} Israel{G2474}.
Then{G5119} Herod{G2264}, when he had{G2564} privily{G2977} called{G2564} the wise men{G3588}, enquired{G198} of{G3844} them{G846}diligently{G198} what time{G3588} the star{G792} appeared{G5316}.

And{G2532} he sent{G3992} them{G846} to{G1519} Bethlehem{G965}, and said{G2036}, Go{G4198} and search{G1833} diligently{G199} for{G4012} the young child{G3588}; and{G1161} when{G1875} ye have found{G2147} him, bring{G518} me{G3427} word again{G518}, that{G3704} I{G2504} may come{G2064} and worship{G4352} him{G846} also{G2504}.

When{G1161} they had heard{G191} the king{G3588}, they departed{G4198}; and{G2532}, lo{G2400}, the star{G3588}, which{G3739} they saw{G1492} in{G1722} the east{G3588}, went before{G4254} them{G846}, till{G2193} it came{G2064} and stood{G2476} over{G1883} where{G3757} the young child{G3588} was{G2258}.
When{G1161} they saw{G1492} the star{G3588}, they rejoiced{G5463} with exceeding{G4970} great{G3173} joy{G5479}.

And{G2532} when they were come{G2064} into{G1519} the house{G3588}, they saw{G2147} the young child{G3588} with{G3326} Mary{G3137} his{G846} mother{G3588}, and{G2532} fell down{G4098}, and worshipped{G4352} him{G846}: and when{G2532} they had opened{G455} their{G846} treasures{G3588}, they presented{G4374} unto him{G846} gifts{G1435}; gold{G5557}, and{G2532} frankincense{G3030}, and{G2532} myrrh{G4666}.

And{G2532} being warned of God{G5537} in{G2596} a dream{G3677} that they should{G344} not{G3361} return{G344} to{G4314} Herod{G2264}, they departed{G402} into{G1519} their own{G846} country{G3588} another{G243} way{G3598}.

And when{G1161} they{G846} were departed{G402}, behold{G2400}, the angel{G32} of the Lord{G2962} appeareth{G5316} to Joseph{G2501} in{G2596} a dream{G3677}, saying{G3004}, Arise{G1453}, and take{G3880} the young child{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} mother{G3588}, and{G2532} flee{G5343} into{G1519} Egypt{G125}, and{G2532} be thou{G2468} there{G1563} until{G2193} I bring{G2036} thee{G4671} word{G2036}: for{G1063} Herod{G2264} will{G3195} seek{G2212} the young child{G3588} to destroy{G622} him{G846}.
When{G1161} he arose{G1453}, he took{G3880} the young child{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} mother{G3588} by night{G3571}, and{G2532} departed{G402} into{G1519} Egypt{G125}:

And{G2532} was{G2258} there{G1563} until{G2193} the death{G3588} of Herod{G2264}: that{G2443} it might be fulfilled{G4137} which was spoken{G4483} of{G5259} the Lord{G3588} by{G1223} the prophet{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Out of{G1537} Egypt{G125} have I called{G2564} my{G3450} son{G3588}.

Then{G5119} Herod{G2264}, when he saw{G1492} that{G3754} he was mocked{G1702} of{G5259} the wise men{G3588}, was{G2373} exceeding{G3029} wroth{G2373}, and{G2532} sent forth{G649}, and slew{G337} all{G3956} the children{G3588} that were{G3588} in{G1722} Bethlehem{G965}, and{G2532} in{G1722} all{G3956} the coasts{G3588} thereof{G846}, from{G575} two years old{G1332} and{G2532} under{G2736}, according to{G2596} the time{G3588} which{G3739} he had diligently enquired{G198} of{G3844} the wise men{G3588}.
Then{G5119} was fulfilled{G4137} that which was spoken{G4483} by{G5259} Jeremy{G2408}the prophet{G3588}, saying{G3004},

In{G1722} Rama{G4471} was there{G191} a voice{G5456} heard{G191}, lamentation{G2355}, and{G2532} weeping{G2805}, and{G2532} great{G4183} mourning{G3602}, Rachel{G4478} weeping{G2799} for her{G846} children{G3588}, and{G2532} would{G2309} not{G3756} be comforted{G3870}, because{G3754} they are{G1526} not{G3756}.
But when{G1161} Herod{G3588} was dead{G5053}, behold{G2400}, an angel{G32} of the Lord{G2962} appeareth{G5316} in{G2596} a dream{G3677} to Joseph{G2501} in{G1722} Egypt{G125},

And{G1161} he arose{G1453}, and took{G3880} the young child{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} mother{G3588}, and{G2532} came{G2064} into{G1519} the land{G1093} of Israel{G2474}.

But{G1161} when he heard{G191} that{G3754} Archelaus{G745} did reign{G936} in{G1909} Judaea{G3588} in the room of{G473} his{G846} father{G3588} Herod{G2264}, he was afraid{G5399} to go{G565} thither{G1563}: notwithstanding{G1161}, being warned of God{G5537} in{G2596} a dream{G3677}, he turned aside{G402} into{G1519} the parts{G3588} of Galilee{G3588}:

And{G2532} he came{G2064} and dwelt{G2730} in{G1519} a city{G4172} called{G3004} Nazareth{G3478}: that{G3704} it might be fulfilled{G4137} which{G3588} was spoken{G4483} by{G1223} the prophets{G3588}, He shall be called{G2564} a Nazarene{G3480}.UNSURE: Tagging of "hoti"
